definition: to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
in the final analysis/in the end
to be as good as one's word (idiom)/to keep one's promise
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
as for/when it comes to
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to think of/to call to mind/to anticipate
to talk about sth
to mention/to speak of/to lift/to pick up/to arouse/to raise (a topic, a heavy weight, one's fist, one's spirits etc)
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
presumably/probably/in all likelihood/surely
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
